[color=yellow]NOTES:[/color]

IMAGiNE bringing you another release..........Mirrors.2

Well this was a pretty straight forward rip of the dvd9 ......yet again a small script with crop,resize,brightness,chroma 
and sharpness.....Once more we thought the video just needed a touch more on the brightness,colour and sharpness,
but otherwise it was a nice source :)
The audio,we stripped the 5.1 track and just remuxed it afterwards to our encode 

Enjoy folks
